title: List of all Android services  app libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android services  app libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: appsly-android-rest
repoList.description: An Android client library for RESTful based web services.

repoList.name: AlexaAndroid
repoList.description: A library and sample app to abstract access to the Amazon Alexa service for Android applications.

repoList.name: AppKillerManager
repoList.description: Android library to handle flaky App killer manager (Xiaomi, Huawei, letv, ...) and prevent from : not showing notification, services not start at boot, etc

repoList.name: ServiceStack.Java
repoList.description: ServiceStack Java Libraries and Apps

repoList.name: cognitive-services-face-android-detect
repoList.description: Android app using the Face service Java client library to detect and frame faces in an image.

repoList.name: Qigsaw
repoList.description: 🔥🔥Qigsaw ['tʃɪɡsɔ] is a dynamic modularization library which is based on Android App Bundles(Do not need Google Play Service). It supports dynamic delivery for split APKs without reinstalling the base one.

repoList.name: API-Calling-Flow
repoList.description: Android library which makes it  easy to handle the different obstacles while calling an API (Web Service) in Android App.

repoList.name: android-permissions
repoList.description: An android library that makes it really easy to deal with dynamic permissions. Based on the context, library automatically decides whether to show a dialog (in case app is in foreground) or a notification (in case permission is required by a background service).

repoList.name: active-directory-b2c-android-native-appauth
repoList.description: Demonstrates how you can use a third party library to build an Android application that authenticates Microsoft identity users to our B2C identity service and calls a web API using OAuth 2.0 access tokens.

repoList.name: EasyAppleSyncAdapter
repoList.description: Easy Apple Sync Adapter, an Android Library for syncing with apple calendar service.

repoList.description: An Android client library for RESTful based web services.
